articles.title: Europeans explore troops for Ukraine ceasefire — and want U.S. support - The Washington Post
articles.description: The prospect of troops in Ukraine gained traction as Europeans seek a role in talks between the Trump team and Moscow that could shape the continent’s security.

articles.author: Matt Fitzpatrick
articles.title: Ukraine isn’t invited to its own peace talks. History is full of such examples – and the results are devastating - The Conversation
articles.description: A decision to negotiate over the heads of the Ukrainians would reveal just how Trump sees Ukraine and Europe.
articles.content:
Ukraine has not been invited to a key meeting between American and Russian officials in Saudi Arabia this week to decide what peace in the country might look like.
